00052 VertexMover::VertexMover( ObjectiveFunction* OF ) 
00053   : QualityImprover(),
00054     objFuncEval( OF ) ,
00055     jacobiOpt(false)
00056   {}

00059 VertexMover::~VertexMover() {}

00061 /*
00062   
00063     +-----------+
00064     |Reset Outer|
00065     |Criterion  |
00066     +-----------+
00067           |
00068           V
00069           +
00070         /   \
00071        /Outer\  YES
00072 +--> <Criterion>-----> DONE
00073 |      \Done?/
00074 |       \   /
00075 |         + 
00076 |         |NO
00077 |         V
00078 |   +-----------+
00079 1   |Reset Mesh |
00080 |   | Iteration |
00081 |   +-----------+
00082 |         |
00083 |         V
00084 |         +
00085 |       /  \
00086 |   NO /Next\
00087 +-----<Patch > <-----+
00088        \    /        |
00089         \  /         |
00090           +          |
00091        YES|          |
00092           V          |
00093     +-----------+    |
00094     |Reset Inner|    |
00095     |Criterion  |    2
00096     +-----------+    |
00097           |          |
00098           V          |  
00099           +          |               
00100         /   \        |
00101        /Inner\  YES  |
00102 +--> <Criterion>-----+    --------------+
00103 |      \Done?/                          |
00104 |       \   /                           |
00105 |         +                             |
00106 |         |NO                           |
00107 |         V                          Inside
00108 3   +-----------+                    Smoother
00109 |   |   Smooth  |                       |
00110 |   |   Patch   |                       |
00111 |   +-----------+                       |
00112 |         |                             |
00113 ----------+               --------------+
00114                       
00115 */        
00116 
00123 double VertexMover::loop_over_mesh( Mesh* mesh,
00124                                     MeshDomain* domain,
00125                                     const Settings* settings,
00126                                     MsqError& err )
00127 {
00128   TagHandle coord_tag = 0; // store uncommitted coords for jacobi optimization 
00129   TagHandle* coord_tag_ptr = 0;
00130 
00131     // Clear culling flag, set hard fixed flag, etc on all vertices
00132   initialize_vertex_byte( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00133 
00134     // Get the patch data to use for the first iteration
00135   OFEvaluator& obj_func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00136   
00137   PatchData patch;
00138   patch.set_mesh( mesh );
00139   patch.set_domain( domain );
00140   if (settings)
00141     patch.attach_settings( settings );
00142   bool one_patch = false, inner_crit_terminated, all_culled;
00143   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_vertices;
00144   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elements;
00145   bool valid;
00146   
00147   PatchSet* patch_set = get_patch_set();
00148   if (!patch_set) {
00149     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No PatchSet for QualityImprover!", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00150     return 0.0;
00151   }
00152   patch_set->set_mesh( mesh );
00153   
00154   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle> patch_list;
00155   patch_set->get_patch_handles( patch_list, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00156   
00157   
00158     // Get termination criteria
00159   TerminationCriterion* outer_crit=this->get_outer_termination_criterion();
00160   TerminationCriterion* inner_crit=this->get_inner_termination_criterion();
00161   if(outer_crit == 0){
00162     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00163     return 0.;
00164   }
00165   if(inner_crit == 0){
00166     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer for inner loop is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00167     return 0.;
00168   }
00169   
00170     // If using a local patch, suppress output of inner termination criterion
00171   if (patch_list.size() > 1) 
00172     inner_crit->set_debug_output_level(3);
00173   else
00174     one_patch = true;
00175   
00176   if (jacobiOpt) {
00177     coord_tag = get_jacobi_coord_tag(mesh, err);
00178     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00179     coord_tag_ptr = &coord_tag;
00180   }
00181   
00182     // Initialize outer loop
00183     
00184   this->initialize(patch, err);        
00185   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00186   
00187   valid = obj_func.initialize( mesh, domain, settings, patch_set, err ); 
00188   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00189   if (!valid) {
00190     MSQ_SETERR(err)("ObjectiveFunction initialization failed.  Mesh "
00191                     "invalid at one or more sample points.", 
00192                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00193     goto ERROR;
00194   }
00195   
00196   outer_crit->reset_outer(mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err); 
00197   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00198   
00199  
00200     // if only one patch, get the patch now
00201   if (one_patch) {
00202     patch_set->get_patch( patch_list[0], patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00203     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00204     patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00205     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00206   }
00207   
00208    // Loop until outer termination criterion is met
00209   inner_crit_terminated = false;
00210   while (!outer_crit->terminate())
00211   {
00212     if (inner_crit_terminated) {
00213       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inner termiation criterion satisfied for all patches "
00214                       "without meeting outer termination criterion.  This is "
00215                       "an infinite loop.  Aborting.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00216       break;
00217     }
00218     inner_crit_terminated = true;
00219     all_culled = true;
00220 
00221         int num_patches=0;
00222       // Loop over each patch
00223     std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator p_iter = patch_list.begin();
00224     while( p_iter != patch_list.end() )
00225     {
00226       if (!one_patch) { // if only one patch (global) re-use the previous one
00227           // loop until we get a non-empty patch.  patch will be empty
00228           // for culled vertices with element-on-vertex patches
00229         do {
00230           patch_set->get_patch( *p_iter, patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00231           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00232           ++p_iter;
00233         } while (patch_elements.empty() && p_iter != patch_list.end()) ;
00234         
00235         if (patch_elements.empty()) { // no more non-culled vertices
00236                 if (0)
00237                   std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk all vertices culled."  << std::endl;
00238           break;
00239         }
00240       
00241         all_culled = false;
00242         patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00243         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00244       } else {
00245         ++p_iter;
00246         all_culled = false;
00247       }
00248         
00249             ++num_patches;
00250 
00251         // Initialize for inner iteration
00252         
00253       this->initialize_mesh_iteration(patch, err);
00254       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00255       
00256       obj_func.reset();
00257       
00258       outer_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00259       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00260       
00261       inner_crit->reset_inner( patch, obj_func, err );
00262       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00263       
00264       inner_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00265       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00266       
00267         // Don't even call optimizer if inner termination 
00268         // criterion has already been met.
00269       if (!inner_crit->terminate())
00270       {
00271         inner_crit_terminated = false;
00272         
00273           // Call optimizer - should loop on inner_crit->terminate()
00274         this->optimize_vertex_positions( patch, err );
00275         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00276       
00277           // Update for changes during inner iteration 
00278           // (during optimizer loop)
00279         
00280         outer_crit->accumulate_patch( patch, err );
00281         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00282         
00283         inner_crit->cull_vertices( patch, obj_func, err );
00284         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00285 
00286                 // FIXME
00287                 if (0)
00288                   {
00289                     inner_crit->cull_vertices_global (patch, 
00290                                                       mesh, domain, settings,
00291                                                       obj_func, err);
00292                     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00293                   }
00294         
00295         patch.update_mesh( err, coord_tag_ptr );
00296         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00297       }
00298     } 
00299 
00300     if (jacobiOpt)
00301       commit_jacobi_coords( coord_tag, mesh, err );
00302 
00303     this->terminate_mesh_iteration(patch, err); 
00304     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00305     
00306     outer_crit->accumulate_outer( mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err );
00307     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00308     
00309     if (all_culled)
00310       break;
00311   }
00312 
00313 
00314 ERROR:  
00315   if (jacobiOpt)
00316     mesh->tag_delete( coord_tag, err );
00317 
00318     //call the criteria's cleanup funtions.
00319   outer_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err);
00320   inner_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err);
00321     //call the optimization cleanup function.
00322   this->cleanup();
00323 
00324   return 0.;
00325 }
00326   
00327 
00328 static void checkpoint_bytes( Mesh* mesh, std::vector<unsigned char>& saved_bytes, MsqError& err)
00329 {
00330   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertexHandlesArray;
00331   mesh->get_all_vertices(vertexHandlesArray, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00332   saved_bytes.resize(vertexHandlesArray.size());
00333   mesh->vertices_get_byte( &vertexHandlesArray[0],
00334                            &saved_bytes[0],
00335                            vertexHandlesArray.size(),
00336                            err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00337 }
00338 
00339 static void restore_bytes( Mesh* mesh, std::vector<unsigned char>& saved_bytes, MsqError& err)
00340 {
00341   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertexHandlesArray;
00342   mesh->get_all_vertices(vertexHandlesArray, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00343   mesh->vertices_set_byte( &vertexHandlesArray[0],
00344                            &saved_bytes[0],
00345                            vertexHandlesArray.size(),
00346                            err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00347 }
00348 
00349   static void save_or_restore_debug_state(bool save)
00350   {
00351     static bool debug[3] = {false,false,false};
00352     if (save) 
00353       {
00354         debug[0] = MsqDebug::get(1);
00355         debug[1] = MsqDebug::get(2);
00356         debug[2] = MsqDebug::get(3);
00357       }
00358     else
00359       {
00360         if (debug[0]) MsqDebug::enable(1);
00361         if (debug[1]) MsqDebug::enable(2);
00362         if (debug[2]) MsqDebug::enable(3);
00363       }
00364   }
00365 
00372 double VertexMover::loop_over_mesh( ParallelMesh* mesh,
00373                                     MeshDomain* domain,
00374                                     const Settings* settings,
00375                                     MsqError& err )
00376 {
00377   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00378   Mesh::VertexHandle vertex_handle;
00379   TagHandle coord_tag = 0; // store uncommitted coords for jacobi optimization 
00380   TagHandle* coord_tag_ptr = 0;
00381   int outer_iter=0;
00382   int inner_iter=0;
00383     bool one_patch = false;
00384 
00385     // Clear culling flag, set hard fixed flag, etc on all vertices
00386   initialize_vertex_byte( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00387 
00388     // Get the patch data to use for the first iteration
00389   OFEvaluator& obj_func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00390   
00391   PatchData patch;
00392   patch.set_mesh( (Mesh*) mesh );
00393   patch.set_domain( domain );
00394   patch.attach_settings( settings );
00395 
00396   ParallelHelper* helper = mesh->get_parallel_helper();
00397   if (!helper) {
00398     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ParallelHelper instance", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00399     return 0;
00400   }
00401 
00402   helper->smoothing_init(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00403 
00404   bool inner_crit_terminated, all_culled;
00405   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_vertices;
00406   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elements;
00407   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> fixed_vertices;
00408   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> free_vertices;
00409    
00410     // Get termination criteria
00411   TerminationCriterion* outer_crit=this->get_outer_termination_criterion();
00412   TerminationCriterion* inner_crit=this->get_inner_termination_criterion();
00413   if(outer_crit == 0){
00414     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00415     return 0.;
00416   }
00417   if(inner_crit == 0){
00418     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer for inner loop is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00419     return 0.;
00420   }
00421   
00422   PatchSet* patch_set = get_patch_set();
00423   if (!patch_set) {
00424     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No PatchSet for QualityImprover!", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00425     return 0.0;
00426   }
00427   patch_set->set_mesh( (Mesh*)mesh );
00428 
00429   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle> patch_list;
00430   patch_set->get_patch_handles( patch_list, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00431   
00432     if (patch_list.size() > 1) 
00433       inner_crit->set_debug_output_level(3);
00434     else
00435       one_patch = true;
00436 
00437   if (jacobiOpt) {
00438     coord_tag = get_jacobi_coord_tag(mesh, err);
00439     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00440     coord_tag_ptr = &coord_tag;
00441   }
00442   
00443   // parallel error checking
00444   MsqError perr;
00445   bool pdone=false;
00446 
00447 #define PERROR_COND continue
00448 
00449     // Initialize outer loop
00450     
00451   this->initialize(patch, err); 
00452   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("initialize patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); } //goto ERROR;
00453   
00454   obj_func.initialize( (Mesh*)mesh, domain, settings, patch_set, err ); 
00455   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("initialize obj_func", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);} //goto ERROR;
00456   
00457   outer_crit->reset_outer( (Mesh*)mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err); 
00458   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("reset_outer", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);} //goto ERROR;
00459    
00460    // Loop until outer termination criterion is met
00461   inner_crit_terminated = false;
00462   all_culled = false;
00463   for (;;)
00464   {
00465     if (0)
00466       std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter << std::endl;
00467 
00468     //PERROR:
00469 
00470     if (MSQ_CHKERR(perr))
00471       {
00472         std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh found parallel error: " << perr << "\n quitting... pdone= " << pdone << std::endl;
00473         pdone = true;
00474       }
00475 
00476     helper->communicate_any_true (pdone, err);
00477 
00478     if (0)
00479       std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter << " pdone= " << pdone << std::endl;
00480 
00481     if (pdone)
00482       {
00483         std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh found parallel error, quitting... pdone= " << pdone << std::endl;
00484         MSQ_SETERR(err)("PARALLEL ERROR", MsqError::PARALLEL_ERROR);
00485         break;
00486       }
00487 
00488     ++outer_iter;
00489 
00502 
00503     bool outer_crit_terminated = outer_crit->terminate();
00504     bool outer_crit_terminated_local = outer_crit_terminated;
00505     helper->communicate_all_true( outer_crit_terminated, err ); 
00506 
00507     bool inner_crit_terminated_local = inner_crit_terminated;
00508     helper->communicate_all_true( inner_crit_terminated, err ); 
00509 
00510     bool all_culled_local = all_culled;
00511     helper->communicate_all_true( all_culled, err ); 
00512 
00513     bool done = all_culled || outer_crit_terminated;
00514     if (inner_crit_terminated) {
00515       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inner termination criterion satisfied for all patches "
00516                       "without meeting outer termination criterion.  This is "
00517                       "an infinite loop.  Aborting.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00518       done = true;
00519       helper->communicate_any_true( done, err ); 
00520     }
00521 
00522     bool local_done=done;
00523 
00524     helper->communicate_all_true( done, err ); 
00525 
00526     if (0)
00527       std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk done= " << done << " local_done= " << local_done 
00528                 << " all_culled= " << all_culled 
00529                 << " outer_crit->terminate()= " << outer_crit->terminate()
00530                 << " outer_term= " << outer_crit_terminated
00531                 << " outer_term_local= " << outer_crit_terminated_local
00532                 << " inner_crit_terminated = " << inner_crit_terminated
00533                 << " inner_crit_terminated_local = " << inner_crit_terminated_local
00534                 << " all_culled = " << all_culled
00535                 << " all_culled_local = " << all_culled_local
00536                 << std::endl;
00537 
00538     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("loop start", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);} //goto ERROR;
00539 
00540 
00541     if (done)
00542       break;
00543     
00544     
00545     inner_crit_terminated = true;
00546     all_culled = true;
00547 
00549 
00550     // get the fixed vertices (i.e. the ones *not* part of the first independent set)
00551     helper->compute_first_independent_set(fixed_vertices); 
00552 
00553     // sort the fixed vertices
00554     std::sort(fixed_vertices.begin(), fixed_vertices.end());
00555 
00556       // Loop over each patch
00557         if (0 && MSQ_DBG(2))
00558           std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk number of patches = " << patch_list.size() 
00559                     << " inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter 
00560                     << " inner.globalInvertedCount = " << inner_crit->globalInvertedCount
00561                     << " outer.globalInvertedCount = " << outer_crit->globalInvertedCount
00562                     << " inner.patchInvertedCount = " << inner_crit->patchInvertedCount
00563                     << " outer.patchInvertedCount = " << outer_crit->patchInvertedCount
00564                     << std::endl;
00565 
00566         save_or_restore_debug_state(true);
00567         //MsqDebug::disable_all();
00568       
00569         int num_patches=0;
00570 
00571     std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator p_iter = patch_list.begin();
00572     while( p_iter != patch_list.end() )
00573     {
00574 
00575 
00576       // loop until we get a non-empty patch.  patch will be empty
00577       // for culled vertices with element-on-vertex patches
00578       do {
00579         patch_set->get_patch( *p_iter, patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00580         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("get_patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00581         ++p_iter;
00582       } while (patch_elements.empty() && p_iter != patch_list.end()) ;
00583         
00584       if (patch_elements.empty()) { // no more non-culled vertices
00585               if (0)
00586                 std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk all vertices culled."  << std::endl;
00587         break;
00588       }
00589 
00590       if (patch_vertices.empty()) // global patch hack (means all mesh vertices)
00591       {
00592         mesh->get_all_vertices(patch_vertices, err);
00593       }
00594 
00595       free_vertices.clear();
00596 
00597       for (size_t i = 0; i < patch_vertices.size(); ++i) 
00598         if (!std::binary_search(fixed_vertices.begin(), fixed_vertices.end(), patch_vertices[i]))
00599           free_vertices.push_back(patch_vertices[i]);
00600 
00601       if (free_vertices.empty()) { // all vertices were fixed -> skip patch
00602         continue;
00603       }
00604 
00605             ++num_patches;
00606       all_culled = false;
00607       patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, free_vertices, err );
00608       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("set_mesh_entities", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00609         
00610         // Initialize for inner iteration
00611         
00612       this->initialize_mesh_iteration(patch, err);
00613       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("initialize_mesh_iteration", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00614       
00615       obj_func.reset();
00616       
00617       outer_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00618       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("reset_patch outer", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00619       
00620       inner_crit->reset_inner( patch, obj_func, err );
00621       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("reset_inner", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00622       
00623       inner_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00624       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("inner reset_patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00625       
00626         // Don't even call optimizer if inner termination 
00627         // criterion has already been met.
00628       if (!inner_crit->terminate())
00629       {
00630         inner_crit_terminated = false;
00631         if (one_patch) ++inner_iter;
00632 
00633           // Call optimizer - should loop on inner_crit->terminate()
00634                 size_t num_vert=patch.num_free_vertices();
00635                 //std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk VertexMover num_vert= " << num_vert << std::endl;
00636               
00637         this->optimize_vertex_positions( patch, err );
00638         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("optimize_vertex_positions", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00639       
00640           // Update for changes during inner iteration 
00641           // (during optimizer loop)
00642         
00643         outer_crit->accumulate_patch( patch, err );
00644         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("outer accumulate_patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00645         
00646         inner_crit->cull_vertices( patch, obj_func, err );
00647         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("inner cull_vertices", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00648 
00649                 // experimental...
00650                 if (0)
00651                   {
00652                     inner_crit->cull_vertices_global (patch, 
00653                                                       mesh, domain, settings,
00654                                                       obj_func, err);
00655                     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("cull_vertices_global", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00656                   }
00657         
00658         patch.update_mesh( err, coord_tag_ptr );
00659         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("update_mesh", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00660       }
00661     } // while(p_iter....
00662 
00663     save_or_restore_debug_state(false);
00664 
00665     if (1)
00666       {
00667         bool pdone_inner=false;
00668 
00669         if (MSQ_CHKERR(perr))
00670           {
00671             std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh found parallel error: " << perr << "\n quitting... pdone_inner= " << pdone_inner << std::endl;
00672             pdone_inner = true;
00673           }
00674 
00675         helper->communicate_any_true (pdone_inner, err);
00676 
00677         if (0)
00678           std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter << " pdone_inner= " << pdone_inner << std::endl;
00679 
00680         if (pdone_inner)
00681           {
00682              if (0)
00683               std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk found parallel error, quitting... pdone_inner= " << pdone_inner << std::endl;
00684             MSQ_SETERR(err)("PARALLEL ERROR", MsqError::PARALLEL_ERROR);
00685             break;
00686           }
00687       }
00688 
00690     std::vector<unsigned char> saved_bytes;
00691     checkpoint_bytes(mesh, saved_bytes, err); 
00692     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("checkpoint_bytes ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00693 
00694     helper->communicate_first_independent_set(err); 
00695     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("communicate_first_independent_set ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00696 
00698         save_or_restore_debug_state(true);
00699         MsqDebug::disable_all();
00700 
00701     while (helper->compute_next_independent_set())
00702     {
00703       // Loop over all boundary elements
00704       while(helper->get_next_partition_boundary_vertex(vertex_handle))
00705       {
00706 
00707         patch_vertices.clear();
00708         patch_vertices.push_back(vertex_handle);
00709         patch_elements.clear(); 
00710         mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &vertex_handle, 
00711                                               1,
00712                                               patch_elements, 
00713                                               junk, err );
00714 
00715         all_culled = false;
00716         patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00717 
00718         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("set_mesh_entities 2 ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00719         
00720         // Initialize for inner iteration
00721         
00722         this->initialize_mesh_iteration(patch, err);
00723         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" initialize_mesh_iteration 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00724         
00725         obj_func.reset();
00726         
00727         outer_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00728         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("outer reset_patch 2 ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00729         
00730         inner_crit->reset_inner( patch, obj_func, err );
00731         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" inner reset_inner 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00732       
00733         inner_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00734         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" inner_crit reset_patch 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00735       
00736         // Don't even call optimizer if inner termination 
00737         // criterion has already been met.
00738         if (!inner_crit->terminate())
00739         {
00740           inner_crit_terminated = false;
00741           
00742           // Call optimizer - should loop on inner_crit->terminate()
00743           this->optimize_vertex_positions( patch, err );
00744           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" optimize_vertex_positions 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00745       
00746           // Update for changes during inner iteration 
00747           // (during optimizer loop)
00748           
00749           outer_crit->accumulate_patch( patch, err );
00750           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" outer accumulate_patch 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00751           
00752           inner_crit->cull_vertices( patch, obj_func, err );
00753           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" inner cull_vertices", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00754 
00755                     // FIXME
00756                     if (0)
00757                       {
00758                         inner_crit->cull_vertices_global (patch, 
00759                                                           mesh, domain, settings,
00760                                                           obj_func, err);
00761                         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" cull_vertices_global 2 ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00762                       }
00763         
00764           patch.update_mesh( err, coord_tag_ptr );
00765           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" update_mesh 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00766         }
00767       }
00768       helper->communicate_next_independent_set(err);
00769       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" communicate_next_independent_set 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00770      } // while(helper->compute_next_independent_set())
00771  
00772     save_or_restore_debug_state(false);
00773  
00774     //if (!get_parallel_rank())
00775     //std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk num_patches= " << num_patches << std::endl;
00776 
00778     restore_bytes(mesh, saved_bytes, err);
00779     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" restore_bytes", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00780 
00781     if (jacobiOpt)
00782       commit_jacobi_coords( coord_tag, mesh, err );
00783 
00784     this->terminate_mesh_iteration(patch, err); 
00785     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" terminate_mesh_iteration", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00786     
00787     outer_crit->accumulate_outer( mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err );
00788     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" outer_crit accumulate_outer", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00789   }
00790 
00791 ERROR: 
00792 
00793   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00794     std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh error = " << err.error_message() << std::endl;
00795   }
00796 
00797   if (jacobiOpt)
00798     mesh->tag_delete( coord_tag, err );
00799 
00800     //call the criteria's cleanup funtions.
00801   outer_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00802   inner_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00803     //call the optimization cleanup function.
00804   this->cleanup();
00805     // close the helper
00806   helper->smoothing_close(err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00807 
00808   return 0.;
00809 }
00810 
00811     
00812 void VertexMover::initialize_queue( Mesh* mesh,
00813                                     MeshDomain* domain,
00814                                     const Settings* settings,
00815                                     MsqError& err )
00816 {
00817   QualityImprover::initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00818   objFuncEval.initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00819 }
00820 
00821 TagHandle VertexMover::get_jacobi_coord_tag( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00822 {
00823     // Get tag handle
00824   const char tagname[] = "msq_jacobi_temp_coords";
00825   TagHandle tag = mesh->tag_create( tagname, Mesh::DOUBLE, 3, 0, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00826     /* VertexMover will always delete the tag when it is done, so it is probably
00827        best not to accept an existing tag
00828   if (err.error_code() == TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS) {
00829     err.clear();
00830     tag = tag_get( tagname, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00831     std::string name;
00832     Mesh::TagType type;
00833     unsigned length;
00834     mesh->tag_properties( tag, name, type, length, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00835     if (type != Mesh::DOUBLE || length != 3) {
00836       MSQ_SETERR(err)(TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00837                      "Tag \"%s\" already exists with invalid type", 
00838                      tagname);
00839       return 0;
00840     }
00841   }
00842     */
00843   
00844     // Initialize tag value with initial vertex coordinates so that
00845     // vertices that never get moved end up with the correct coords.
00846   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00847   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00848     // remove fixed vertices
00849     // to avoid really huge arrays (especially since we need to copy
00850     // coords out of annoying MsqVertex class to double array), work
00851     // in blocks
00852   const size_t blocksize = 4096;
00853   std::vector<bool> fixed(blocksize);
00854   MsqVertex coords[blocksize];
00855   double tag_data[3*blocksize];
00856   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); i += blocksize) {
00857     size_t count = std::min( blocksize, vertices.size() - i );
00858       // remove fixed vertices
00859     mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( &vertices[i], fixed, count, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00860     size_t w = 0;
00861     for (size_t j = 0; j < count; ++j)
00862       if (!fixed[j])
00863         vertices[i + w++] = vertices[i + j];
00864     count = w;
00865       // store tag data for free vertices
00866     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &vertices[i], coords, count, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00867     for (size_t j = 0; j < count; ++j) {
00868       tag_data[3*j  ] = coords[j][0];
00869       tag_data[3*j+1] = coords[j][1];
00870       tag_data[3*j+2] = coords[j][2];
00871     }
00872     mesh->tag_set_vertex_data( tag, count, &vertices[i], tag_data, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00873   }
00874   
00875   return tag;
00876 }
00877 
00878 void VertexMover::commit_jacobi_coords( TagHandle tag, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00879 {
00880   Vector3D coords;
00881   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00882   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00883   std::vector<bool> fixed( vertices.size() );
00884   mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( &vertices[0], fixed, vertices.size(), err );
00885   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
00886     if (!fixed[i]) {
00887       mesh->tag_get_vertex_data( tag, 1, &vertices[i], coords.to_array(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00888       mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( vertices[i], coords, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00889     }
00890   }
00891 }
